text: Matteo Elias Kenzo Guendouzi Valverde Mendoza Olié (; born 14 April 1999) is a French footballer. He plays as a midfielder for Ligue 1 club Marseille and the France national team. ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Île-de-France Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players Category:People from Yvelines
title: Matteo Guendouzi
